ability.name: My Life for Yours
ability.flavor: You channel some of your vitality into more resilience for you or an ally.
ability.trigger: The target starts their turn or takes damage.

effects.effect: You spend a Recovery and the target regains Stamina equal to your recovery value.
You can end one effect on the target that is ended by a saving throw or that ends at the end of their turn, or a prone target can stand up.
